name: Shell Gadus S4 OGH 100
description: Advanced Open Gear and Wirerope Grease

localDocs.name: Gadus S4 OGH 100 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.0 26-NOV-2020

marketing:
Shell Gadus S4 OGH 100 is a full EP Grease developed for the lubrication and protection of open gears subjected to extremes of ambient temperature and operating conditions.
Shell Gadus S4 OGH 100 combines high performance with an environmentally safe chemistry that minimizes the cost of disposal and provide optimum performance, providing a tenacious lubricant film that resists ‘fling off’.
